properties.description: Large welcoming modern library with friendly staff. Facilities include lots of seating, public toilets (incl disabled and baby change facilities, free WiFi, free to use public computers, tea / coffee available, phone / device charging, newspapers, water cooler, digital help. Lift access to 1st floor library.
